name: @dougkulak/semrel-toolkit-monorepo
description: Semantic release tools, plugins and configs for OSS projects

scripts.test:report: echo "tests disabled" && exit 0 || yarn test && yarn coveralls:push
scripts.test:concurrent: echo "tests disabled" && exit 0 || lerna run test --stream --no-prefix && yarn coverage:merge
scripts.test:depcheck: echo "tests disabled" && exit 0 || lerna run test:depcheck --parallel --stream --no-prefix
scripts.test:depaudit: echo "tests disabled" && exit 0 || yarn audit --level=moderate --groups=dependencies; [[ $? -ge 4 ]] && exit 1 || exit 0
scripts.coveralls:push: cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls || echo 'coveralls push failed :(' && exit 0
scripts.postupdate: yarn && yarn bootstrap && yarn test:depauditfix && yarn clean && yarn build && yarn test
